name: BLINDFOLDED MIND GAME
description: In the reality represented by the human mind, things are accepted thru the channels of the 5 senses of the human body. When one or two or more of the senses are covered, things become abstracted. Abstraction of things is the sign of searching for truth, and searching for the truth always reveals the illusion. When the mind is not controlled the game is not yours. The one who can control the mind is the one who knows what is real.
